trans-unit.source:
\n

Provides culture-specific information for formatting and parsing numeric values.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxxxxxx xxxxxxx$xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxx xxxxxx.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the number of decimal places to use in currency values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The property is being set to a value that is less than 0 or greater than 99.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xx x xxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 00.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string to use as the decimal separator in currency values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xxxxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The property is being set to an empty string.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xx xx xxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string that separates groups of digits to the left of the decimal in currency values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the number of digits in each group to the left of the decimal in currency values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxx xx xxxx xxxxx xx xxx xxxx xx xxx xxxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
The property is being set and the array contains an entry that is less than 0 or greater than 9.

-or-

The property is being set and the array contains an entry, other than the last entry, that is set to 0.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0.$$x$$x$x$$xx$ $$x$$x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xxx xxx xxxxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx$ xxxxx xxxx xxx xxxx xxxxx$ xxxx xx xxx xx 0.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the format pattern for negative currency values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The property is being set to a value that is less than 0 or greater than 15.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xx x xxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 00.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the format pattern for positive currency values.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxxxxx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

The property is being set to a value that is less than 0 or greater than 3.
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxx xxxxxxxx xx xxxxx xxx xx x xxxxx xxxx xx xxxx xxxx 0 xx xxxxxxx xxxx 0.

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string to use as the currency symbol.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xx xxx xx xxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string that represents the IEEE NaN (not a number) value.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxx XXXX XxX $xxx x xxxxxx$ xxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string that represents negative infinity.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x

trans-unit.source:
\n

Gets or sets the string that denotes that the associated number is negative.

\n
trans-unit.target: $x$x$Xxxx xx xxxx xxx xxxxxx xxxx xxxxxxx xxxx xxx xxxxxxxxxx xxxxxx xx xxxxxxxx.$$x$$x
